alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Cass; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 9:30PM CST until March 02 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marion County in northeastern Texas... Cass County in northeastern Texas... Harrison County in northeastern Texas... Central Panola County in northeastern Texas... Northern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... Southern Bowie County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1030 PM CST. * At 930 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Us 259 And I 30 Intersection to near Tyler, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Longview, Marshall, Henderson, Kilgore, Carthage, Atlanta, Hallsville, Overton, Waskom, Jefferson, Linden, Hughes Springs, Queen City, Tatum, Maud, New London, Beckville, Deberry, Bivins and Elysian Fields. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Bowie; Cass; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Rusk
